info.notes: First release from the Universal Century timeline. Features the Core Block Transformation and Combination System. Includes fully transformable FF-X7 Core Fighter, a non-transformable Core Block, and an Amuro Ray figurine. Kits from RG-01 to RG-13 use a base adapter that is compatible with Action Base 2 only.
